00028 #ifndef STYPES_HEADER
00029 #define STYPES_HEADER
00030 
00031 #include "ddconfig.h"

00033 
00034 typedef unsigned char   uchar;
00035 typedef unsigned int    uint;
00036 typedef unsigned long   ulong;
00037 typedef TYPE_DWORD      t_addr;         /* 32 bit max */
00038 typedef TYPE_UWORD      t_mem;          /* 16 bit max */
00039 typedef TYPE_WORD       t_smem;         /* signed 16 bit memory */
00040 
00041 struct id_element
00042 {
00043   int id;
00044   char *id_string;
00045 };
00046 
00047 enum error_type {
00048   err_unknown  = 0x01,
00049   err_error    = 0x02,
00050   err_warning  = 0x04
00051 };
00052 
00053 // table of dissassembled instructions
00054 struct dis_entry
00055 {
00056   uint  code, mask;
00057   char  branch;
00058   uchar length;
00059   char  *mnemonic;
00060 };
00061 
00062 // table entry of SFR and BIT names
00063 struct name_entry
00064 {
00065   int           cpu_type;
00066   t_addr        addr;
00067   char          *name;
00068 };
00069 
00070 
00071 struct cpu_entry
00072 {
00073   char *type_str;
00074   int  type;
00075   int  technology;
00076 };
00077 
00078 #define CPU_51          0x0001
00079 #define CPU_31          0x0002
00080 #define CPU_52          0x0004
00081 #define CPU_32          0x0008
00082 #define CPU_51R         0x0010
00083 #define CPU_89C51R      0x0020
00084 #define CPU_251         0x0040
00085 #define CPU_DS390       0x0080
00086 #define CPU_DS390F      0x0100
00087 #define CPU_ALL_51      (CPU_51|CPU_31)
00088 #define CPU_ALL_52      (CPU_52|CPU_32|CPU_51R|CPU_89C51R|CPU_251|CPU_DS390|CPU_DS390F)
00089 
00090 #define CPU_AVR         0x0001
00091 #define CPU_ALL_AVR     (CPU_AVR)
00092 
00093 #define CPU_Z80         0x0001
00094 #define CPU_ALL_Z80     (CPU_Z80)
00095 
00096 #define CPU_XA          0x0001
00097 #define CPU_ALL_XA      (CPU_XA)
00098 
00099 #define CPU_HC08       0x0001
00100 #define CPU_ALL_HC08   (CPU_HC08)
00101 
00102 #define CPU_CMOS        0x0001
00103 #define CPU_HMOS        0x0002
00104 
00105 /* Classes of memories, this is index on the list */
00106 enum mem_class
00107 {
00108   MEM_ROM= 0,
00109   MEM_XRAM,
00110   MEM_IRAM,
00111   MEM_SFR,
00112   MEM_DUMMY,
00113   MEM_IXRAM,
00114   MEM_TYPES
00115 };
00116 
00117 #define MEM_ROM_ID      "rom"
00118 #define MEM_SFR_ID      "sfr"
00119 #define MEM_XRAM_ID     "xram"
00120 #define MEM_IXRAM_ID    "ixram"
00121 #define MEM_IRAM_ID     "iram"
00122 
00123 // States of simulator
00124 #define SIM_NONE        0
00125 #define SIM_GO          0x01    // Processor is running
00126 #define SIM_QUIT        0x02    // Program must exit
00127 
00128 /* States of CPU */
00129 #define stGO            0       /* Normal state */
00130 #define stIDLE          1       /* Idle mode is active */
00131 #define stPD            2       /* Power Down mode is active */
00132 
00133 /* Result of instruction simulation */
00134 #define resGO           0       /* OK, go on */
00135 #define resWDTRESET     1       /* Reseted by WDT */
00136 #define resINTERRUPT    2       /* Interrupt accepted */
00137 #define resSTOP         100     /* Stop if result greather then this */
00138 #define resHALT         101     /* Serious error, halt CPU */
00139 #define resINV_ADDR     102     /* Invalid indirect address */
00140 #define resSTACK_OV     103     /* Stack overflow */
00141 #define resBREAKPOINT   104     /* Breakpoint */
00142 #define resUSER         105     /* Stopped by user */
00143 #define resINV_INST     106     /* Invalid instruction */
00144 #define resBITADDR      107     /* Bit address is uninterpretable */
00145 #define resERROR        108     /* Error happened during instruction exec */
00146 
00147 #define BIT_MASK(bitaddr) (1 << (bitaddr & 0x07))
00148

00155 //#define EROM_SIZE 0x10000 /* Size of External ROM */

00158 /* Type of breakpoints */
00159 enum brk_perm
00160 {
00161   brkFIX,       /* f */
00162   brkDYNAMIC    /* d */
00163 };
00164 
00165 enum brk_type
00166 {
00167   brkFETCH,     /* f */
00168   brkEVENT      /* e */
00169 };
00170 
00171 enum brk_event
00172 {
00173   brkNONE,
00174   brkWXRAM,     /* wx */
00175   brkRXRAM,     /* rx */
00176   brkRCODE,     /* rc */
00177   brkWIRAM,     /* wi */
00178   brkRIRAM,     /* ri */
00179   brkWSFR,      /* ws */
00180   brkRSFR,      /* rs */
00181   brkREAD,
00182   brkWRITE,
00183   brkACCESS
00184 };
00185 
00186 //struct event_rec
00187 //{
00188 //  t_addr wx; /* write to XRAM at this address, else -1 */
00189 //  t_addr rx; /* read from XRAM at this address, else -1 */
00190 //  t_addr wi; /* write to IRAM at this address, else -1 */
00191 //  t_addr ri; /* read from IRAM at this address, else -1 */
00192 //  t_addr ws; /* write to SFR at this address, else -1 */
00193 //  t_addr rs; /* read from SFR at this address, else -1 */
00194 //  t_addr rc; /* read from ROM at this address, else -1 */
00195 //};

00197 /* Interrupt levels */
00198 //#define IT_NO         -1 /* not in interroupt service */
00199 #define IT_LOW          1 /* low level interrupt service */
00200 #define IT_HIGH         2 /* service of high priority interrupt */

00202 /* cathegories of hw elements (peripherials) */
00203 enum hw_cath {
00204   HW_DUMMY      = 0x0000,
00205   HW_TIMER      = 0x0002,
00206   HW_UART       = 0x0004,
00207   HW_PORT       = 0x0008,
00208   HW_PCA        = 0x0010,
00209   HW_INTERRUPT  = 0x0020,
00210   HW_WDT        = 0x0040
00211 };
00212 
00213 // Events that can happen in peripherals
00214 enum hw_event {
00215   EV_OVERFLOW,
00216   EV_PORT_CHANGED,
00217   EV_T2_MODE_CHANGED
00218 };
00219 
00220 // flags of hw units
00221 #define HWF_NONE        0
00222 #define HWF_INSIDE      0x0001
00223 #define HWF_OUTSIDE     0x0002
00224 #define HWF_MISC        0x0004

00227 /* Letter cases */
00228 enum letter_case {
00229   case_upper,  /* all is upper case */
00230   case_lower,  /* all is lower case */
00231   case_case    /* first letter is upper, others are lower case */
00232 };
